data.Name: Jon Pardi
data.Bio: Jon Pardi is an American country music singer and songwriter. Pardi has charted 12 singles on the Billboard Hot Country Songs and Country Airplay charts, with three hitting #1 on the latter: "Head Over Boots", "Dirt on My Boots", and "Heartache Medication". Signed to Capitol Nashville, he has released three studio albums: Write You a Song (2014), California Sunrise (2016), and Heartache Medication (2019). Pardi's music style is defined by neotraditional country influences. Read more on Last.fm
